Verses: 2 nee Isravel Puththirarode Pesi, Avargal Pidhaakkalin Vamsangalaagiya Ovvoru Vamsaththinudaiya Prabuvinidaththil, Ovvoru Kolaagap Pannirandu Kolai Vaangi, Avanavan Kolil Avanavan Perai Ezhudhuvaayaaga.
3 leviyinudaiya Kolinmel Aaronin Perai Ezhudhakkadavaai; Avargaludaiya Pidhaakkalin Ovvoru Vamsaththalaivanukkaagavum Ovvoru Kol Irukkavendum.
4 avaigalai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Naan Ungalai Sandhikkum Sthaanamaagiya Saatchippettikku Munne Vaikkakkadavaai.
5 appozhudhu Naan Therindhukollugiravanudaiya Kol Thulirkkum; Ippadi Isravel Puththirar Ungalukku Virodhamaai Murumurukkira Avargal Murumuruppai Ennaivittu Ozhiyappannuven Endraar.

6 idhai Mose Isravel Puththirarode Sonnaan; Appozhudhu Avargaludaiya Prabukkal Ellaarum Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Vamsaththinpadi Ovvoru Prabuvukku Ovvoru Kolaagap Pannirandu Kolgalai Avanidaththil Koduththaargal; Aaronin Kolum Avargaludaiya Kolgaludane Irundhadhu.
7 andhak Kolgalai Mose Saatchiyin Koodaaraththile Karththarudaiya Samugaththil Vaiththaan.

8 marunaal Mose Saatchiyin Koodaaraththukkul Pravesiththapodhu, Idho, Leviyin Kudumbaththaarukku Irundha Aaronin Kol Thulirththirundhadhu; Adhu Thulirvittu, Pooppooththu, Vaadhumaippazhangalaik Koduththadhu.

9 appozhudhu Mose Karththarudaiya Samugaththilirundha Andhak Kolgalaiyellaam Eduththu, Isravel Puththirar Ellaarum Kaana Veliye Konduvandhaan; Avargal Kandu, Avaravar Thangal Thangal Kolgalai Vaangikkondaargal.

10 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Aaronin Kol Andhak Kalakakkaararukku Virodhamaana Adaiyaalamaagumporuttu, Adhaith Thirumbavum Saatchippettikku Munne Kondupoi Vai; Ippadi Avargal Enakku Virodhamaai Murumuruppadhai Ozhiyappannuvaai, Appozhudhu Avargal Saagamaattaargal Endraar.
12 appozhudhu Isravel Puththirar Moseyai Nokki: Idho, Seththu Azhindhupogirom; Naangal Ellaarum Azhindhupogirom.
13 karththarin Vaasasthalaththin Kittevarugira Evanum Saagiraan; Naangal Ellaarum Seththuththaan Theerumo Endraargal.
